amendment.description: At the end of division F (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, United States Code, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act" and such disposition is listed as "willful" or "repeated".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 186 printed in House Report 115-297 to prohibit funds from going federal contracts with willful or repeated violators of the Fair Labor Standards Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A155) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 226 (Roll no. 514).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A155) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 226 (Roll no. 514).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A155) offered by Mr. Ellison.
